Description: St Anthony; beset by devils; the text field below blank. Illustration designed for an edition of Koberger's 'Hortulus Animae'. c.1518 Woodcut
Bibliographic references: Dodgson 1903, 1911 / Catalogue of Early German and Flemish Woodcuts in the BM, 2 vols (I.386.27)
New Hollstein (German) / The New Hollstein: German engravings, etchings and woodcuts 1400-1700 (221) (Springinklee)
Associated names: Representation of: St Antony of Egypt
